feature.title: Real-Time Vehicle Dispatch Engine
feature.description: Enable Urban Commuters and College Students to request autonomous vehicles through mobile app with sub-60 second dispatch times using GPS tracking, ML route optimization, and real-time fleet management across urban campus zones.
feature.business_value: Reduces average wait time by 40%, increases ride completion rate by 25%, enables 10,000+ daily rides across campus zones with 99.9% dispatch reliability.
edge_cases: GPS signal loss in parking structures

context.product_vision: Transform urban mobility with AI-powered autonomous ride-sharing that delivers sub-60 second dispatch times and 99.9% reliability for campus communities.

user_stories.title: One-Tap Ride Request
user_stories.user_story: As an Urban Commuter, I want to request a ride with one tap so that I can minimize booking time during rush hour
user_stories.description: As an Urban Commuter, I want to request a ride with one tap so that I can minimize booking time during rush hour. The mobile app displays a prominent 'Request Ride' button that uses current location and learns frequent destinations, dispatching nearest autonomous vehicle within 45 seconds.
acceptance_criteria: Given I open the app, When I tap 'Request Ride', Then vehicle dispatch begins within 2 seconds
Given my location is detected, When no destination is set, Then app suggests my top 3 frequent destinations

user_stories.title: Real-Time Vehicle Dispatch Engine Integration
user_stories.user_story: As a System Administrator, I want the mobile app to integrate with the Real-Time Vehicle Dispatch Engine so that I can ensure efficient route optimization and reliable vehicle dispatching across campus zones.
user_stories.description: As a System Administrator, I want the mobile app to integrate with the Real-Time Vehicle Dispatch Engine so that I can ensure efficient route optimization and reliable vehicle dispatching across campus zones. The mobile app connects to the Real-Time Vehicle Dispatch Engine via API, exchanging data on user requests, vehicle locations, and estimated arrival times.
acceptance_criteria: Given the mobile app is connected to the Real-Time Vehicle Dispatch Engine, When a new ride request is made, Then engine dispatches nearest available vehicle within 10 seconds
Given multiple ride requests are made simultaneously, When engine optimizes routes for each vehicle, Then ETA is displayed on user's device within 5 seconds

user_stories.title: Real-Time Dispatch Engine User Interface
user_stories.user_story: As an Urban Commuter, I want to view real-time vehicle locations and ETAs on the mobile app so that I can track my ride status and plan my route more efficiently.
user_stories.description: As an Urban Commuter, I want to view real-time vehicle locations and ETAs on the mobile app so that I can track my ride status and plan my route more efficiently. The mobile app displays a map showing nearby vehicles, their locations, and estimated arrival times, along with a countdown timer for ETA.
acceptance_criteria: Given I am viewing the map, When I select a vehicle on the map, Then its location and ETA are displayed on the screen
Given I view the screen, When I see multiple vehicles selected, Then app displays them on the map with corresponding ETAs
